survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Remote Work Cybersecurity Training Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness and satisfaction with remote work cybersecurity training programs provided by the organization.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in the organization's remote work cybersecurity training programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options are clear and cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in the organization's remote work cybersecurity training programs?

questions.question_text: Which topics covered in the cybersecurity training do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered anything other than 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option to capture any additional topics.
